author: Judith Prakash J
casename: United States Trading Co Pte Ltd v Ting Boon Aun and Another
counsel: Melvin Lum (Rajah & Tann) for the plaintiff; Lee Mun Hooi (Lee Mun Hooi & Co) for the second defendant
tags: Partnership/Partners and third parties/Firm liable for acts of partner

Partnership/Partners and third parties/Firm liable for acts of partner/Partner of firm absconding with money received by firm but intended for another party/Whether money was received in course of firm's business under s 11(b) Partnership Act (Cap 391, 1994 Rev Ed)/Whether other partners liable to make good loss of money
